Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34403 affecting package uriparser for versions less than 0.9.8-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34403 affecting package uriparser for versions less than 0.9.8-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package uriparser is earlier than 0.9.8-3, affected by CVE-2024-34403
